name: Space Force
overview: The Adventure Vision Space Force cartridge is based on the famous Venture Line arcade game and includes all the key features of its big brother. Your mission is to fly the mother ship through wave after wave of meteor showers launched by the evil alliance powers from the planets Zeral and Xenac. Your job is to blow all alien life forms and meteors to atoms with your phaser cannon, but, you had better be quick in your ability to manuever and fire. So, plug your cartridge into Adventure Vision, grab the joy stick and get ready for action. For 1 or 2 players.
